mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.shelf_id AS "opShelfInfo.id", a.sku_id AS "skuInfo.id", a.center_id AS "centerOffice.id", a.shelf_user AS "shelfUser.id", a.shelf_qty AS "shelfQty", a.org_price AS "orgPrice", a.sale_price AS "salePrice", a.min_qty AS "minQty", a.max_qty AS "maxQty", a.shelf_time AS "shelfTime", a.unshelf_user AS "unshelfUser.name", a.unshelf_time AS "unshelfTime", a.priority AS "priority", a.status AS "delFlag", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate", su.name AS "createBy.name", bsi.name AS "skuInfo.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user su on su.id = a.update_id LEFT JOIN biz_sku_info bsi on bsi.id = a.sku_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_op_shelf_sku( id, shelf_id, sku_id, center_id, shelf_user, shelf_qty, org_price, sale_price, min_qty, max_qty, shelf_time, unshelf_user, unshelf_time, priority, status, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{opShelfInfo.id}, #{skuInfo.id}, #{centerOffice.id}, #{shelfUser.id}, #{shelfQty}, #{orgPrice}, #{salePrice}, #{minQty}, #{maxQty}, #{shelfTime}, #{unshelfUser.name}, #{unshelfTime}, #{priority}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_op_shelf_sku SET shelf_id = #{opShelfInfo.id}, sku_id = #{skuInfo.id}, center_id = #{centerOffice.id}, shelf_user = #{shelfUser.id}, shelf_qty = #{shelfQty}, org_price = #{orgPrice}, sale_price = #{salePrice}, min_qty = #{minQty}, max_qty = #{maxQty}, shelf_time = #{shelfTime}, unshelf_user = #{unshelfUser.name}, unshelf_time = #{unshelfTime}, priority = #{priority}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
